title: Electrically tunable on-chip quantum Deutsch–Jozsa algorithm with lithium niobate metasurfaces
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,18311-18316
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02001D, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Haoyu Li, Ruisheng Yang, Yinan Zhang, Linyuan Dou, Yijie Luo, Haigang Liang, Yuancheng Fan, Zeyong Wei
An on-chip quantum Deutsch–Jozsa algorithm device enables electrical tuning by applying varying external voltages to each unit via two gates.
